channel.title: Everybody Dance Now on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Everybody Dance Now on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Things That Make You Go Hmmmm …
item.description: [big]As early-‘90s dance music icons go, C+C Music Factory is no KLF, though in many ways, they’ve managed to hold onto a small smidgen of cultural relevance thanks to the 1990 dance-pop classic “Gonna Make You Sweat (Everybody Dance Now),” which at the time of release drew more notoriety for full-sized Martha Wash being hidden from the group’s music video—one of two videos where that took place that year.[/big] These days, however, it’ll be known as the song that will get you fined by the Montreal police for yelling in your car.
